title: Who knew The Beatles could silence Dave Grohl?
text:
Are we going through a Beatles revival? I mean, not that they ever really went away, but it’s been 50 years since the release of Abbey Road, and Beatlemania still feels as if it’s on the rise. Abbey Road is shooting up the album charts again this week and the BBC has marked the anniversary with a four-day pop-up radio station, Radio 2 Beatles, celebrating The Beatles’ creative achievements, their legacy, and the cultural moment of the Sixties that they represented.

Hours and hours of Beatles songs were broadcast, with lots of speech to accompany them and reflect on the passing of half a century since four men from Liverpool changed music forever, including a fascinating two-part documentary,...
description: Are we going through a Beatles revival?
